data.name: MagicalMahoWorld
data.detailed_description:
My specialty is physical attack!!
Pixel art side-scrolling comical fantasy magical action sent by Vtuber magical girl!!
The magical girl goes on a journey in search of magical things scattered all over the place!
Believe in your magical power and run around the mysterious world from the magical gate!

This game is an orthodox side-scrolling 2D action game.
You can experience various worlds from the beginning with the stage selection type.
Run through various stages and successfully defeat the boss, and the ability is yours.
The difficulty level depends on the abilities you have acquired, so it's up to you to decide which stage to start!

After clearing all the stages, more !?
See for yourself the future! !!


Magical Girl Kohaku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
